alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 8:29PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Greeley County through 900 PM CDT... At 829 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spalding, or 29 miles east of Ord, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Greeley County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
